EXPENSES
(1) Each party shall bear the expenses it incurred during or due to the proceedings.
(2) If there are any joint expenses, the court shall decide in what proportion they shall be borne by the parties.
(3) Following a motion by one of the parties, the court may decide that the other party shall refund the expenses it has caused the first party to incur due to manifestly acting in bad faith.
